Provider Networks

Andrew Bruce

Source: vignettes/articles/networks.Rmd
networks.Rmd
library(provider)
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
library(stringr)
library(igraph)
library(qs)
library(ggraph)
library(tidygraph)

Provider Networks 

ga <- provider:::georgia_reassignments()
# ga |> 
#   filter(!is.na(organization)) |> 
#   arrange(desc(reassignments)) |> 
#   slice(50000:n())
southland <- ga |> 
  filter(pac_org == "1153563770") |> 
  mutate(individual = stringr::str_glue("{first} {last}")) |> 
  select(organization, 
         individual,
         associations,
         entry, 
         reassignments_org = reassignments, 
         pac_org, 
         enid_org, 
         npi_ind = npi, 
         pac_ind = pac, 
         enid_ind = enid)

southland
#> # A tibble: 102 Ã— 10
#>    organization individual associations entry reassignments_org pac_org enid_org
#>    <chr>        <glue>            <int> <chr>             <int> <chr>   <chr>   
#>  1 SGMP SOUTHLâ€¦ ASHLEY ABT            8 Reasâ€¦               102 115356â€¦ O201308â€¦
#>  2 SGMP SOUTHLâ€¦ OBIORA AGâ€¦            2 Reasâ€¦               102 115356â€¦ O201308â€¦
#>  3 SGMP SOUTHLâ€¦ CHARLES Aâ€¦            2 Reasâ€¦               102 115356â€¦ O201308â€¦
#>  4 SGMP SOUTHLâ€¦ DENISE ATâ€¦            4 Reasâ€¦               102 115356â€¦ O201308â€¦
#>  5 SGMP SOUTHLâ€¦ DANIEL AYâ€¦           11 Emplâ€¦               102 115356â€¦ O201308â€¦
#>  6 SGMP SOUTHLâ€¦ WAEL AZER             9 Reasâ€¦               102 115356â€¦ O201308â€¦
#>  7 SGMP SOUTHLâ€¦ JESSICA Bâ€¦            4 Reasâ€¦               102 115356â€¦ O201308â€¦
#>  8 SGMP SOUTHLâ€¦ ROBIN BELâ€¦            4 Reasâ€¦               102 115356â€¦ O201308â€¦
#>  9 SGMP SOUTHLâ€¦ ROSEMARY â€¦            7 Emplâ€¦               102 115356â€¦ O201308â€¦
#> 10 SGMP SOUTHLâ€¦ REEMON BIâ€¦            4 Reasâ€¦               102 115356â€¦ O201308â€¦
#> # â„¹ 92 more rows
#> # â„¹ 3 more variables: npi_ind <chr>, pac_ind <chr>, enid_ind <chr>
individuals <- southland |>
  filter(associations > 5) |> 
  distinct(npi_ind, .keep_all = TRUE) |> 
  pull(npi_ind) |>
  map_dfr(~reassignments(npi = .x)) |> 
  mutate(individual = str_glue("{first} {last}")) |> 
  select(individual,
         organization, 
         associations,
         entry, 
         reassignments_org = reassignments, 
         pac_org, 
         enid_org, 
         npi_ind = npi, 
         pac_ind = pac, 
         enid_ind = enid) |> 
  filter(organization != "SGMP SOUTHLAND LLC")

individuals

{igraph} 

bound_ig <- igraph::graph_from_data_frame(bind_rows(southland, individuals), directed = TRUE)
bound_ig
#> IGRAPH 375a72a DN-- 217 362 -- 
#> + attr: name (v/c), associations (e/n), entry (e/c), reassignments_org
#> | (e/n), pac_org (e/c), enid_org (e/c), npi_ind (e/c), pac_ind (e/c),
#> | enid_ind (e/c)
#> + edges from 375a72a (vertex names):
#> [1] SGMP SOUTHLAND LLC->ASHLEY ABT               
#> [2] SGMP SOUTHLAND LLC->OBIORA AGBIMSON          
#> [3] SGMP SOUTHLAND LLC->CHARLES ALEXIS           
#> [4] SGMP SOUTHLAND LLC->DENISE ATKINSON          
#> [5] SGMP SOUTHLAND LLC->DANIEL AYERS             
#> [6] SGMP SOUTHLAND LLC->WAEL AZER                
#> + ... omitted several edges
plot(bound_ig, 
     vertex.label.cex = 0.5, 
     vertex.size = 3, 
     vertex.color = "gray90", 
     vertex.frame.width = 1)



{tidygraph} & {ggraph} 

south_grph <- tidygraph::as_tbl_graph(southland, directed = TRUE) |> 
  mutate(importance = centrality_degree(mode = 'all'))
south_grph
#> # A tbl_graph: 103 nodes and 102 edges
#> #
#> # A rooted tree
#> #
#> # A tibble: 103 Ã— 2
#>   name               importance
#>   <chr>                   <dbl>
#> 1 SGMP SOUTHLAND LLC        102
#> 2 ASHLEY ABT                  1
#> 3 OBIORA AGBIMSON             1
#> 4 CHARLES ALEXIS              1
#> 5 DENISE ATKINSON             1
#> 6 DANIEL AYERS                1
#> # â„¹ 97 more rows
#> #
#> # A tibble: 102 Ã— 10
#>    from    to associations entry      reassignments_org pac_org enid_org npi_ind
#>   <int> <int>        <int> <chr>                  <int> <chr>   <chr>    <chr>  
#> 1     1     2            8 Reassignmâ€¦               102 115356â€¦ O201308â€¦ 105381â€¦
#> 2     1     3            2 Reassignmâ€¦               102 115356â€¦ O201308â€¦ 159825â€¦
#> 3     1     4            2 Reassignmâ€¦               102 115356â€¦ O201308â€¦ 173026â€¦
#> # â„¹ 99 more rows

ind_grph <- tidygraph::as_tbl_graph(individuals, directed = TRUE) |> 
  mutate(importance = centrality_degree(mode = 'all'))
ind_grph
#> # A tbl_graph: 141 nodes and 260 edges
#> #
#> # A directed acyclic multigraph with 2 components
#> #
#> # A tibble: 141 Ã— 2
#>   name                      importance
#>   <chr>                          <dbl>
#> 1 ASHLEY ABT                         7
#> 2 DANIEL AYERS                      10
#> 3 WAEL AZER                         17
#> 4 ROSEMARY BERGERON JOHNSON          6
#> 5 ALFORD BRADY                       7
#> 6 BRENDA BRYAN                       8
#> # â„¹ 135 more rows
#> #
#> # A tibble: 260 Ã— 10
#>    from    to associations entry      reassignments_org pac_org enid_org npi_ind
#>   <int> <int>        <int> <chr>                  <int> <chr>   <chr>    <chr>  
#> 1     1    28            8 Reassignmâ€¦               150 488085â€¦ O201207â€¦ 105381â€¦
#> 2     1    29            8 Reassignmâ€¦                34 589094â€¦ O201212â€¦ 105381â€¦
#> 3     1    30            8 Reassignmâ€¦               214 721424â€¦ O201506â€¦ 105381â€¦
#> # â„¹ 257 more rows
#> # â„¹ 2 more variables: pac_ind <chr>, enid_ind <chr>


p <- ggraph(ind_grph, "graphopt") + 
  geom_edge_link(arrow = arrow(length = unit(0.5, 'mm')), 
                 end_cap = circle(2.5, 'mm'), edge_width = 0.3, edge_alpha = 0.5) +
  geom_node_point(
    #aes(size = importance), 
                  show.legend = FALSE, 
                  alpha = 0.5, 
                  color = 'steelblue') + 
  geom_node_text(aes(label = name), 
                 repel = TRUE, 
                 size = 1.25, 
                 #label.size = 0.1,
                 check_overlap = FALSE) +
  theme_graph(fg_text_colour = 'white')
